panels.description: For each 30-minute interval shows the average number of creation attempts alongside its upper control limit (mean + 3 × std dev). Any point where the average approaches or exceeds the upper bound flags an anomalous spike in attempts.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date_create, INTERVAL 30 minute) at,
    avg(attempt) AS "среднее время",
    stddevPop(attempt) AS "стандартное отклонение",
    "среднее время" + 3 * "стандартное отклонение" AS "верхняя граница"
FROM
    attempt_create_time_all
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(date_create)
group by at

panels.title: 30-Minute attempts control chart

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date_create, INTERVAL 30 minute) at,
    avg(full_time) AS "average time",
    stddevPop(full_time) AS "standard dev",
    "average time" + 3 * "standard dev" AS "upper bound"
FROM
    attempt_create_time_all
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(date_create) 
group by at

SELECT
    t0.newTS,
    (t0.allItems - t0.tryFirst) / t2.items AS "Items with more that 1 attempts"
FROM
(
    SELECT
        toStartOfInterval(fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(csd.ts), INTERVAL 1 day) AS newTS,
        countDistinctIf(csd.item_id, cssd.is_created) AS tryFirst,
        countDistinct(csd.item_id) AS allItems
    FROM item_upload.company_statistic_daily_all AS csd
    GLOBAL INNER JOIN item_upload.company_statistic_status_daily_all AS cssd
        ON csd.item_id = cssd.item_id AND csd.ts = cssd.ts
    WHERE fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(csd.ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), INTERVAL 1 day)
    GROUP BY newTS
) AS t0
LEFT JOIN
(
    SELECT
        newTS,
        sum(originRow.2) AS items
    FROM (
        SELECT
            toStartOfInterval(fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts), INTERVAL 1 day) AS newTS,
            arrayJoin(uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins)) AS originRow
        FROM item_upload.item_change_log_stat_all
        WHERE fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), INTERVAL 1 day)
        GROUP BY newTS
    ) AS t
    WHERE t.originRow.1 NOT LIKE '%update/%'
    GROUP BY newTS
) AS t2
ON t0.newTS = t2.newTS

panels.description: Any time the average creation latency approaches or exceeds the upper boundary indicates an unusual slowdown in the process

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date_create, INTERVAL 30 minute) at,
    avg(full_time) AS "avg time",
    stddevPop(full_time) AS "stdev",
    "avg time" + 3 * "stdev" AS "upper bound"
FROM
    attempt_create_time_all
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(date_create) 
group by at

panels.title: 30-Minute creation latency control chart

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date_create, INTERVAL 30 minute) at,
    avg(attempt) AS "avg time",
    stddevPop(attempt) AS "stdev",
    "avg time" + 3 * "stdev" AS "upper bound"
FROM
    attempt_create_time_all
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(date_create)
group by at

panels.description: Percentage of items greater than three standard deviations in attempt time

targets.rawSql:
WITH
    (
        SELECT
            avg(attempt) AS mean_time,
            stddevPop(attempt) AS stddev_time
        FROM attempt_create_time
        WHERE $__timeFilter(date_create)
    ) AS stats

SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date_create, INTERVAL 30 minute) AS at,
    countIf(attempt > (stats.mean_time + 3 * stats.stddev_time)) * 100.0 / count() AS "items beyond bound"
FROM attempt_create_time
WHERE $__timeFilter(date_create)
GROUP BY at

panels.title: Percentage of items greater than 3 standard deviations in 30 minutes

targets.rawSql:
WITH
    quantileTiming(0.90)(cnt) AS avg_load_time
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(hour, INTERVAL 30 minute ) at,
    (avg_load_time / lagInFrame(avg_load_time) OVER (ORDER BY at) - 1) * -100 AS "By amount"
FROM (SELECT
          toStartOfMinute(date_create) AS hour,
          uniq(item_id) cnt
      FROM
          attempt_create_time_all
      WHERE
          $__timeFilter(date_create)
        and is_created
      Group by hour
      ORDER BY
          hour) t0
GROUP BY at
ORDER BY at;

WITH
    avg(cnt) AS avg_load_time
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(hour, INTERVAL 30 minute ) at,
    (avg_load_time / lagInFrame(avg_load_time) OVER (ORDER BY at) - 1) * 100 AS "By time"
FROM (SELECT
          toStartOfMinute(date_create) AS hour,
          uniq(item_id) cnt
      FROM
          attempt_create_time_all
      WHERE
          $__timeFilter(date_create)
        and is_created
      Group by hour
      ORDER BY
          hour) t0
GROUP BY at
ORDER BY at;

panels.description: Shows the percentage of item‐creation attempts that did not result in a successful save.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(date_create, INTERVAL 1 minute) AS day,
  sum(if(is_created, 0, 1)) / count() * 100 AS "failure_rate"
FROM attempt_create_time_all
WHERE $__timeFilter(date_create)
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day

panels.title: Daily failure rate

targets.rawSql:
with
  avg(cnt) as average_products,
  stddevPop(cnt) AS standard_deviation,
  average_products + 1 * standard_deviation AS upper_bound,
  average_products - 1 * standard_deviation AS lower_bound_orig
select
    toStartOfHour(hour) AS hour,
    upper_bound "верхняя граница",
    if(lower_bound_orig >= 0,  lower_bound_orig, 0) "нижняя граница"
from
    (SELECT
        toStartOfMinute(date_create) AS hour,
        uniq(item_id) cnt
    FROM
        attempt_create_time_all
    WHERE
        $__timeFilter(date_create)
        and is_created
    Group by hour
    ORDER BY
        hour) t0
Group by hour
ORDER BY
    hour;

SELECT
        toStartOfMinute(date_create) AS at,
        uniq(item_id) "Товаров"
    FROM
        attempt_create_time_all
    WHERE
        is_created
    Group by at
    ORDER BY
        at

panels.title: Создание товаров в минуту со стандартным отклонением за 30 мин

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        toStartOfMinute(date_create) AS at,
        if(country != 'RU', 'Глобал', 'РФ') as "Сегмент",
        uniq(item_id) "Товаров"
    FROM
        attempt_create_time_all
    WHERE
        is_created
    Group by at, "Сегмент"
    ORDER BY
        at, "Сегмент"

panels.title: Создание товаров в минуту по сегментам

panels.description: companies that upload more than 4 mediafiles

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts)) AS day,
  -- доля компаний, у которых count(media) > 5
  round(
    countIf(arraySum(mapValues(media)) > 5) * 100.0
    / count(),
    2
  ) AS heavy_pct
FROM company_statistic_daily_all
WHERE $__timeFilter(fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts))
GROUP BY day
ORDER BY day

panels.title: % of all companies with heavy media

panels.description: Учитываются только товары которые дошли до полки, упавшие товары не учитываются, см. график ниже по всем добавленным item

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    t0.newTS,
    t0.tryFirst / t2.items AS "С первой попытки",
    t0.allItems / t2.items AS "Добавлено на полку",
    t0.tryFirst AS "Количество с первой попытки",
    t0.allItems AS "Количество добавленных на полку"
FROM
(
    SELECT
        toStartOfInterval(fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(csd.ts), INTERVAL 1 day) AS newTS,
        uniqIf(csd.item_id, cssd.is_created) AS tryFirst,
        countDistinct(csd.item_id) AS allItems
    FROM item_upload.company_statistic_daily_all AS csd
    GLOBAL INNER JOIN item_upload.company_statistic_status_daily_all AS cssd
        ON csd.item_id = cssd.item_id AND csd.ts = cssd.ts
    WHERE $__timeFilter(csd.ts)
    GROUP BY newTS
) AS t0
LEFT JOIN
(
    SELECT
        newTS,
        sum(originRow.2) AS items
    FROM
    (
        SELECT
            toStartOfInterval(fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts), INTERVAL 1 day) AS newTS,
            arrayJoin(uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins)) AS originRow
        FROM item_upload.item_change_log_stat_all
        WHERE $__timeFilter(ts)
        GROUP BY newTS
    ) AS t
    WHERE t.originRow.1 NOT LIKE '%update/%'
    GROUP BY newTS
) AS t2
ON t0.newTS = t2.newTS
WHERE t0.newTS >= toDateTime('2024-10-04')

panels.title: Процент созданных товаров с первой и более попыток

panels.description: Highlights regions with longest item creation

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  country,
  quantile(0.5)(full_time)  AS p50_ms,
  quantile(0.95)(full_time) AS p95_ms
FROM attempt_create_time_all
WHERE is_created
  AND $__timeFilter(date_create)
GROUP BY country
ORDER BY p95_ms DESC

panels.title: P95 and median of full delay by country

panels.description: Количество добавленных новых item в разрезе дня

targets.rawSql:
select
 newTS,
 country "Страна", 
 sum(originRow.2) "Товаров"
from
(select
    toStartOfInterval(fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts), INTERVAL 1 day) newTS,
    company_id,
    country,
    arrayJoin(uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins)) originRow
from item_change_log_stat_all
where
    $__dateFilter(newTS)
group by newTS, company_id, country) t
where
 t.originRow.1 not like '%update/%'
group by newTS, country
order by newTS, country

panels.title: Добавлено item за период

panels.description: Количество добавленных новых item в разрезе дня

targets.rawSql:
select
 newTS,
 country "Страна", 
 sum(originRow.2) "Товаров"
from
(select
    toStartOfInterval(fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts), INTERVAL 1 day) newTS,
    company_id,
    country,
    arrayJoin(uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins)) originRow
from item_change_log_stat_all
where
    $__dateFilter(newTS)
group by newTS, company_id, country) t
where
 t.originRow.1 not like '%update/%'
group by newTS, country
order by newTS, country

panels.title: Процент по странам item

panels.description: Table of origin channels ranked by their average number of attempts before creation

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  origin,
  round(avg(attempt), 2)          AS avg_attempts,
  round(stddevPop(attempt), 2)    AS stddev_attempts
FROM attempt_create_time
WHERE is_created
  AND attempt >= 0                
  AND $__timeFilter(date_create)
GROUP BY origin
ORDER BY avg_attempts DESC

panels.title: Origin performance

targets.builderOptions: The query is not a select statement.

meta.builderOptions: The query is not a select statement.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    newTS,
    media_type AS "Тип медиа",
    sum(if(match(media_url, '.*?(ozone\\.ru|ozonusercontent\\.com)$'), cnt_media, 0)) AS "Количество наших",
    sum(if(match(media_url, '.*?(ozone\\.ru|ozonusercontent\\.com|bad_hostname)$'), 0, cnt_media)) AS "Количество внешних",
    sum(if(match(media_url, '.*?(bad_hostname)$'), cnt_media, 0)) AS "Количество плохих ссылок"
FROM (
    SELECT
        fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(csm.ts) AS newTS,
        splitByString(':', media_entry.1) AS media_array,
        media_array[1] AS media_type,
        media_entry.1 AS media_key,
        media_entry.2 AS cnt_media,
        replaceOne(media_entry.1, concat(media_array[1], ':'), '') AS media_url
    FROM item_upload.company_statistic_daily_all AS csm
    ARRAY JOIN url_by_media AS media_entry
) t
GROUP BY newTS, media_type
ORDER BY newTS, media_type

panels.description: Уникальное количество продавцов загрузивших товаров, как обновление так и добавление

targets.rawSql:
select
    uniq(company_id)
          from company_statistic_daily_all
where
    fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), interval 1 day)

panels.title: Уникальных продавцов

panels.description: Сколько всего обновили товаров дошедших до полки за сегодня

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    origin,
    reinterpretAsInt64(sum(item_val)) - reinterpretAsInt64(sum(try_val)) AS diff
FROM (
    SELECT
        originRow.1 AS origin,
        originRow.2 AS item_val
    FROM (
        SELECT arrayJoin(uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins)) AS originRow
        FROM item_upload.item_change_log_stat_all
        WHERE fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), INTERVAL 1 day)
    )
) AS i
FULL OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT
        originRow.1 AS origin,
        originRow.2 AS try_val
    FROM (
        SELECT arrayJoin(uniqMapMerge(tryItemOrigins)) AS originRow
        FROM item_upload.item_change_log_stat_all
        WHERE fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), INTERVAL 1 day)
    )
) AS t
USING (origin)
GROUP BY origin
ORDER BY diff DESC

panels.title: Добавленных товаров обновлено

panels.description: Сколько всего попыток добавить товары за день

targets.rawSql:
select
 sum(originRow.2)
from
(select
    arrayJoin(uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins)) originRow
from item_change_log_stat_all
where
    fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), interval 1 day)) t

panels.title: Попыток  добавления товаров

panels.description: Количество товаров которые пытаются добавить на полку, учитываются не только за текущий день, но и за предыдущие дни

targets.rawSql:
select
 sum(originRow.2)
from
(select
    company_id,
    arrayJoin(uniqMapMerge(tryItemOrigins)) originRow
from item_change_log_stat_all
where
    fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), interval 1 day) group by company_id) t

panels.title: Товаров добавляемых до полки

panels.description: Сколько всего попыток обновить добавленные товары за день

targets.rawSql:
select
 sum(originRow.2)
from
(select
    arrayJoin(mapSubtract(uniqMapMerge(origins),uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins))) originRow
from item_change_log_stat_all
where
    fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), interval 1 day)) t
where
 t.originRow.1 like '%update/%'

panels.title: Попыток обновления добавленных товаров

panels.description: Новые продавцы

targets.rawSql:
select
    fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) newTS,
    uniq(company_id) "Новых продавцов"
from
    company_statistic_daily_all
where
    fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), interval 1 day)
    and company_id > (select max(company_id) from company_statistic_daily_all where fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) < toStartOfInterval(now(), interval 1 day))
group by
    newTS
order by newTS

panels.title: Уникальных новых продавцов

panels.description: Уникальных продавцов загрузивших товары с первого раза

targets.rawSql:
SELECT uniq(company_id)
FROM (
    SELECT
        csd.company_id,
        uniqIf(csd.item_id, cssd.is_created) AS frst,
        countIf(origin NOT LIKE '%update/%') AS al
    FROM item_upload.company_statistic_daily_all AS csd
    GLOBAL JOIN item_upload.company_statistic_status_daily_all AS cssd
        ON csd.item_id = cssd.item_id AND csd.ts = cssd.ts
    WHERE fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(csd.ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), INTERVAL 1 day)
    GROUP BY csd.company_id
    HAVING frst = al
) t

panels.title: Уникальных продавцов с первого раза

panels.description: Уникальных продавцов не сумевших загрузить товары

targets.rawSql:
SELECT uniq(company_id)
FROM (
    SELECT
        company_id,
        arraySum(mapValues(uniqMapMerge(tryItemOrigins))) AS c1,
        arraySum(mapValues(uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins))) AS c2
    FROM item_change_log_stat_all
    WHERE fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), INTERVAL 1 day)
    GROUP BY company_id
    HAVING c1 = c2
) t

panels.title: Уникальных продавцов "потрачено"

targets.rawSql:
select
 originRow.1 origin,
 sum(originRow.2)
from
(select
    company_id,
    arrayJoin(uniqMapMerge(origins)) originRow
from item_change_log_stat_all
where
    fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), interval 1 day) group by company_id) t
    group by origin

select
 originRow.1 origin,
 sum(originRow.2)
from
(select
    company_id,
    arrayJoin(uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins)) originRow
from item_change_log_stat_all
where
    fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) >= toStartOfInterval(now(), interval 1 day) group by company_id) t
    group by origin

select
  fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) newTS,
  uniq(company_id) "Уникальных продавцов"
from 
  company_statistic_daily_all
where
    $__dateFilter(newTS)
group by
  newTS
order by newTS

SELECT
    newTS,
    uniqIf(company_id, items = 1) AS "Продавцов с первой попытки",
    uniqIf(company_id, items > 1) AS "Продавцов с более одной попытки"
FROM (
    SELECT
        toStartOfInterval(fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts), INTERVAL 1 day) AS newTS,
        company_id,
        countDistinctIf(item_id, origin NOT LIKE '%update/%') AS items
    FROM item_upload.company_statistic_daily_all
    WHERE $__timeFilter(ts)
    GROUP BY newTS, company_id
) AS t
GROUP BY newTS
ORDER BY newTS

panels.description: Показывает 10 самых загружаемых продавцов по попыткам (attempts)

targets.rawSql:
select
    toDate(newTS) "День",
    company_id "Компания",
    attempts "Попыток",
    originAttempts "Попыток по источнику"
    from (
select
    toStartOfInterval(fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts), INTERVAL 1 day) newTS,
    company_id,
    arraySum(mapValues(uniqMapMerge(origins))) attempts,
    mapSort((k,v) -> -v,uniqMapMerge(origins)) originAttempts,
    row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY newTS ORDER BY attempts DESC) AS rankAttempts
from item_change_log_stat_all
group by newTS, company_id) t
WHERE $__dateFilter(t.newTS) and rankAttempts <= 10
order by  t.newTS DESC, rankAttempts
limit 100

panels.title: Топ попыток продавцов

panels.description: Показывает 10 самых загружаемых продавцов по товарам (items)

targets.rawSql:
select
    toDate(newTS) "День",
    company_id "Компания",
    items "Товаров",
    originItems "Товаров по источнику"
    from (
select
    toStartOfInterval(fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts), INTERVAL 1 day) newTS,
    company_id,
    arraySum(mapValues(uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins))) items,
    mapSort((k,v) -> -v,uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins)) originItems,
    row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY newTS ORDER BY items DESC) AS rankItems
from item_change_log_stat_all
group by newTS, company_id) t
WHERE $__dateFilter(t.newTS) and rankItems <= 10
order by  t.newTS DESC, rankItems
limit 100

panels.title: Топ товаров продавцов

panels.description: Which sellers for the last 7 days have the amount of loads per last day higher than the bount mu+2sigma  (30-days history)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  d.day,
  d.company_id,
  d.cnt,
  s.mu,
  s.sigma,
  -- флаг «спайка», =1 если дневной объём > μ + 2·σ
  d.cnt > s.mu + 2 * s.sigma AS is_spike
FROM
(
  -- 1) дневные объёмы за текущее время панели
  SELECT
    toDate(date_create) AS day,
    company_id,
    count()             AS cnt
  FROM attempt_create_time_all
  WHERE $__timeFilter(date_create)
  GROUP BY day, company_id
) AS d
ANY LEFT JOIN
(
  -- 2) статистика по всем дням за последний месяц
  SELECT
    company_id,
    avg(cnt)          AS mu,
    stddevPop(cnt)    AS sigma
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      toDate(date_create) AS day,
      company_id,
      count()             AS cnt
    FROM attempt_create_time_all
    WHERE date_create BETWEEN subtractDays(today(), 30) AND today()
    GROUP BY day, company_id
  )
  GROUP BY company_id
) AS s
USING company_id
-- показываем только последние 7 дней
WHERE d.day >= subtractDays(today(), 7)
ORDER BY d.cnt DESC

panels.title: Anomalies among sellers

panels.description: Показывает количество попыток и товаров по источнику

targets.rawSql:
select
    fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) At,
    mapSort((k,v) -> -v,uniqMapMerge(origins)) "Попыток по источникам",
    mapSort((k,v) -> -v,uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins)) "Товаров по источникам"
from item_change_log_stat_all
WHERE company_id = ${company_id}
group by At
order by At desc

panels.title: Загрузки по продавцу $company_id

panels.description: Где загрузок больше 15К или по компании

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    tm,
    toString(company_id) || ' (' || country || ')' AS seller_info,
    sum(originRow.2) items
    
FROM (select
          fromUnixTimestamp64Nano(ts) AS tm,
          company_id,
          country,
          arrayJoin(mapSubtract(uniqMapMerge(origins),uniqMapMerge(itemOrigins))) originRow
      from item_change_log_stat_all
      where
          $__timeFilter(tm) and (company_id = ${company_id} or ${company_id} = 0)
      group by tm, company_id, country) t
GROUP BY
    tm,
    country,
    company_id
HAVING
    (items > 15000 and ${company_id} = 0) or company_id = ${company_id}     
ORDER BY
    tm,
    country,
    company_id
limit 500

panels.title: Статистика загрузки по продавцам
